page.title: 04 Home Life
page.content:
I work at the weekend on a farm which is called{Little Trill.}I work by making sure the sheep haven't escaped into the silage or hay field.
I help to look after the sheep. If a sheep is on it's back it can't roll onto its feet. If it is left it will die.
I go hay-bobbing which is turning the hay over so it will dry on the other side. Five or six days later my Dad, Ted, Derek and I go to make hay.
We get about 1050 bales and five trailors get loaded. Me an Dad milk the cows. There are forty cows. It takes two hours. The dairy takes twelve cows at a time. Then I drive the cows out when we finish.
